# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the column for debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Getting a description of a data column

- **description**: A text representation of the column.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the column shown in a playground.
